唔係Hong Kong People﹐

https://twitter.com/SenTomCotton/status/1268609893906485248?s=09


如果有巴絲係中學生，寫英文essay果陣想講「香港人」，請寫Hongkongers
假如老師話你錯，同佢講牛津字典都有https://www.lexico.com/definition/hongkonger
佢唔接受由佢
但係記住香港人既英文唔係Hong Kong people
我地唔係香港既住民，我地係香港人，香港係我地既家鄉
建構身份認同，由一個英文字做起
推呢個

replies.msg:
http://www.linglish.net/2008/10/22/so-many-nationality-suffixes/

呢個語言學 website 講 nationality suffixes 講得好詳細
有興趣可入去睇下

8 major suffixes, they are:

-ian (Italian, Norwegian)
-ean (Chilean, Korean)
-an (American, Mexican)
-ese (Chinese, Japanese)
-er (Icelander, New Zealander)
-ic (Icelandic, Greenlandic)
-ish (English, Irish)
-i (Iraqi, Pakistani)

個作者搵埋啲 Suffix 嘅 Origin 出來

Suffix Origin
-ian Latin
-ean Latin
-an Latin
-ese Latin → Italian
-er Latin → Germanic
-ic Latin → Germanic
-ish Germanic
-i Arabic
